# Layth Ayache

> AI systems architect and infrastructure engineer based in Lebanon.

## Canonical Identity
- Name: Layth Ayache
- Role: AI Systems Architect and Infrastructure Engineer
- Location: Lebanon
- Website: https://laythayache.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/laythayache
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/laythayache

## Focus Areas
- Artificial intelligence and machine learning systems
- Computer vision products and accessibility technology
- Public information infrastructure and distributed data pipelines
- Production engineering, observability, and API architecture

## Projects
- [Public Information Infrastructure](https://laythayache.com/projects/public-information-infrastructure) | status: ongoing | updated: 2026-02-14
  Production-grade infrastructure for collecting, normalizing, and serving public media data. Tracks changes, ensures provenance, provides structured API access to information that matters.
- [OmniSign](https://laythayache.com/projects/omnisign) | status: ongoing | updated: 2026-02-01
  Production sign language translation system for Lebanese Sign Language. Real-time on-device CV pipeline with federated learning architecture for privacy preservation.
